column5:
I've grown up thinking the death penalty is appropriate for child rapists and I still do. But these people are obviously sick. It's not like this guy was normal and then one day woke up and thought to do these things. There needs to be a way for people to confess these thoughts to a doctor and not feel persecuted, if they are just thoughts. Nobody imo is gonna feel safe telling their doctor that they wanna shoot up the school or they are aroused by violence and kids etc.

After the fact though, fuck them
I didnt get any in mine.. I'll sign yours!
Ohhhhhhh wait I wasn't mind controlling Trump into peace in the middle east? Why am I here
Idk where to put this but I feel good... i had a plan to die today but i didnt
